channel.title: [bluur]Animations dont take effect?[bluur]
channel.description:
hello mopar ok, when i added the Barrelchest anchor animations in class20, compiled fine, and no errors, no unpacking error, i logged in, pickedup the barrelchest anchor, and i dont weild it correctly? i hold it with 1 hand. and when i attack, i punch... for reference, i have added all of SWAT's tuts, Emote system Anim header Extending emote list
REMEMBER: this is a bluurrs could some1 help? must i do server side edits? im new to bluurrs, thanks
